info.name: Frank Falor
info.bio: I do a little bit of everything. I am a quick learner, and I love a challenge. The reason I pursued a career in tech is that it is constantly changing. I embrace and seek out the next disruptive technology. I feel the reason I can adapt quickly to new concepts or technologies is that I have a solid core skillset consisting of many programming languages, Cloud, Configuration Management, and Infrastructure as code. Combine those skills with a DevOps mindset, and I am confident I will meet any business need.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science (B.S), Management Information Systems
education.description: I graduated Magna Cum Laude with a 3.9/4.0 GPA. I was a College of Business Ambassador. I was selected for membership of Beta Gamma Sigma, the international honor society for collegiate schools of business.
Graduated Cum Laude with a 3.6/4.0 GPA.

certifications.certification: AWS Certified DevOps Engineer â€“ Professional

work.title: Lead Cloud Engineer
work.description: In my new role, I will help change how we do configuration management by taking a cloud native approach. I will encourage and promote development best practices like testing, CI/CD, and coding best practices. I will help design and develop cloud solutions that will allow us to iterate fast and release often.

work.title: Associate Analyst
work.description: Worked on many projects over the last few years. Notable examples are implemented and maintained Puppet for the member firm, created an automated on-premise server provisioning process, and API development.

work.title: ITS Intern
work.description: Focused on Automation of on-premise Server provisioning and configuration management.

work.title: Samsung Gear App Development
work.description: As a hobby, I write Samsung Gear Applications for Samsung Smartwatches. The watches are based on the TizenOS. The apps are mainly built with JavaScript.

projects.title: Codename Umbrella
projects.description: Over the last few years I've been very slowly and casually developing a game for PC and Console. This is a pure passion project initialy created because I could not find a game with all the elements I enjoy. The game combines multiple game genres, RTS Controls, Resouce Management, Base Building, and a Progressive Difficulty System with unlimited scale. Powered by Unreal, written with C++.

projects.title: This Website
projects.description: This website was a side project to play with React and Javascript. The whole website is generated from a JSON file. Feel free to use this as a template for your own website.

projects.title: Runelite Plugins
projects.description: Runelite is a extremely popular open source game client for the MMO Runescape. As a hobby, I often contribute to this project and create plugins to be used by the community. Runelite has an normal daily user base of around 120k players, and my plugins, as of this writing, are installed by around 32k users.

projects.title: Group Members Task
projects.description: Puppet task module that allows you to add or remove members to an already existing local windows group. Can be used to automate the addition and removal of access on multiple machines.

projects.title: Registry Task
projects.description: Puppet task module that allows you create, delete, and update registry keys on windows. Commonly used to automate the configuration of windows machines.

projects.title: Resolve SID Task
projects.description: Puppet task module that allows you to remove unresolvable sids from local groups. This task can be used to fix common unresolveable sid error.
